text: The fifth season of the Russian reality talent show The Voice Kids premiered on February 2, 2018 on Channel One. Dmitry Nagiev returned as the show's presenter. Valery Meladze returned for his second season. Pelageya, who returned for her fourth season after a one-season break, replaced Nyusha. Basta replaced Dima Bilan as a new coach for the show. Rutger Garecht was announced the winner on April 20, 2018, marking Pelageya's first win as a coach and the first female coach to win in the show's history. ==Coaches and presenters== There are two changes to the coaching panel from season four. Coach Valery Meladze is joined by Basta and Pelageya, who replaced Dima Bilan and Nyusha. Also there is a change to the presenters panel from season four. Presenter Dmitry Nagiev is joined by Agata Muceniece, who replaced Svetlana Zeinalova. ==Teams== ;Colour key {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; width:100%;" |- ! scope="col" width="12%" | Coaches ! rowspan="5" | Episode 9 | rowspan=5| Basta | 1 | Sofia Fedorova | "Кажется" | style="background:#b0e6b0;"| Received the Comeback |- | 2 | style="background:#B0E0E6;"| Akmal Hodzhiniyazov | style="background:#B0E0E6;"| "This is a Man's World" | style="background:#B0E0E6;"| Advanced |- | 3 | style="background:#B0E0E6;"| Alexandra Ushakova | style="background:#B0E0E6;"| "Tough Lover" | style="background:#B0E0E6;"| Advanced |- | 4 | Elvira Apsheva | "Runnin'" | style="background:#b0e6b0;"| Received the Comeback |- | 5 | Elizaveta Labodina | "Something New" | style="background:#b0e6b0;"| Received the Comeback |- |} ==Live shows== ;Colour key: {| class="toccolours"style="font-size: 90%; white- space: nowrap;" |- | style="background:#fdfc8f; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist was saved by the Public's votes |- | style="background:#fedf00; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist received the top performances bonus/bonuses that week |- | style="background:pink; border:1px solid black;"| | Artist was eliminated |} ===Week 1: Live Playoffs (April 13)=== As with Season 2, each coach saved three artists who were eliminated in the Sing-offs. Playoff results were voted on in real time. Nine artists sang live and six of them were eliminated by the end of the night. Three saved artists advanced to the Final. Sofia Fedorova (#1), Eden Golan (#2), and Olesya Masheiko (#3) received the top performances bonuses that week. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:80%;" |- ! style="width:07%;" | Episode ! style="width:10%;" | Coach ! style="width:05%;" | Order ! style="width:15%;" | Artist ! style="width:21%;" | Song ! style="width:08%;" | Public's vote ! style="width:09%;" | Result |- ! rowspan="9" scope="row" | Episode 10 | rowspan="3"| Pelageya | 1 | Leonid Novozhilov | "Ничего на свете лучше нету" | 30.8% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | 2 | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Eden Golan | style="background:#fedf00;"| "Мама моя" | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| 37% | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Advanced |- | 3 | Angelina Galetskaya | "History Repeating" | 32.2% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | rowspan="3"| Valery Meladze | 4 | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Olesya Masheiko | style="background:#fedf00;"| "Куда уходит детство" | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| 50.5% | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Advanced |- | 5 | Evelina Bolshakova | "Песня царевны Забавы" | 20% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | 6 | David Khinikadze | "Baila Morena" | 29.5% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | rowspan="3"| Basta | 7 | Elizaveta Labodina | "Лететь" | 31.4% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | 8 | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Sofia Fedorova | style="background:#fedf00;"| "Torn" | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| 38.2% | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Advanced |- | 9 | Elvira Apsheva | "Разные люди" | 30.4% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |+Non- competition performances |- ! Order ! Performer ! Song |- | 10.1 | Sergey Bezrukov and Team Pelageya (Leonid Novozhilov, Eden Golan, and Angelina Galetskaya) | "Берёзы" |- | 10.2 | Ani Lorak and Team Valery (Olesya Masheiko, Evelina Bolshakova, and David Khinikadze) | "Сопрано" |- | 10.3 | Uma2rman and Team Basta (Elizaveta Labodina, Sofia Fedorova, and Elvira Apsheva) | "Проститься" |- |} ===Week 2: Final (April 20)=== The Top 9 performed on April 20, 2018. Rutger Garecht (#1 and #2), Sofia Fedorova (#3 and #5), and Akmal Hodzhaniyazov (#4) received the top performances bonuses that week. ====Round 1==== During the first round of the Final, all of the Top 9 performed for the votes of the public. The artist with the highest number of votes on each team advanced to the second round of the Final. Left six artists were eliminated by the end of the First Final Round. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:80%;" |- ! style="width:10%;" | Episode ! style="width:10%;" | Coach ! style="width:05%;" | Order ! style="width:15%;" | Artist ! style="width:21%;" | Song ! style="width:05%;" | Public's vote ! style="width:9%;" | Result |- ! rowspan="9" scope="row" | Episode 11 | rowspan="3"| Valery Meladze | 1 | Tali Kuper | "Снится сон" | 11.2% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | 2 | Olesya Masheiko | "Аист на крыше" | 25.5% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | 3 | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Anastasia Gladilina | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| "Ой, ты, степь широкая" | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| 63.3% | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Public's vote |- | rowspan="3"| Pelageya | 4 | Eden Golan | "All About That Bass" | 8.2% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | 5 | Veronika Syromlya | "Поговори со мною, мама" | 42.8% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | 6 | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Rutger Garecht | style="background:#fedf00;"| "Журавль по небу летит" | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| 49% | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Public's vote |- | rowspan="3"| Basta | 7 | Akmal Hodzhaniyazov | style="background:#fedf00;"| "They Don't Care About Us" | 44% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- | 8 | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Sofia Fedorova | style="background:#fedf00;"| "Мама" | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| 49.8% | style="background:#fdfc8f;"| Public's vote |- | 9 | Alexandra Ushakova | "Скандал" | 6.2% | style="background:pink;"| Eliminated |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |+Non-competition performances |- !
